markdownRemark.html: I'm struggling today, overwhelmed by how much has been asked of me. No more than two days after riding a wave of relief at Auri's turnaround, I'm panicked with fear watching her get another cold. Last night, Lennox had us up in the middle of the night with croup, and this morning Auri has had a runny nose. We knew this would happen and that we'd be terrified, but somehow I've been unable to emotionally prepare. With this disease, children often suffer "flares" with unrelated illness and report
